plot: John Carpenter's The Thing as performed by the claymated, Antarctic cast of the hit children's animation Pingu.
title: Pingu's the Thing

plot_en: John Carpenter's The Thing as performed by the claymated, Antarctic cast of the hit children's animation Pingu.
